name: Funeral Kazoo
description:
These funeral goers seem a bit sad don't they? Well, no need to worry, as the funeral kazoo is on the case!

However, this particular kazoo gets excited at the thought of cheering all those people up and changes to a new random color every 5 seconds.

Cheer up as many people as you can, collect their money, and escape before the timer hits zero!

Move: Arrow Keys/ WASD

Aim: Cursor

Play the kazoo: Left Mouse Button

Start game: Space
